meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by paraphilia.
meanings.sent1: The psychologist discussed the paraphilic behavior of the patient.
meanings.sent2: The therapist specialized in treating paraphilic disorders.
meanings.sent3: The paraphilic tendencies of the character in the movie provided comic relief.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with unusual objects was as paraphilic as collecting rare stamps.
meanings.sent5: The artist's paraphilic art pieces were both intriguing and controversial.

meanings.sent1: The researchers conducted a study on paraphilic interests in individuals.
meanings.sent2: The book delved into the world of paraphilic fantasies.
meanings.sent3: The paraphilic theme of the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His obsession with vintage cars was almost paraphilic in nature.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a paraphilic relationship in a thought-provoking manner.

meanings.sent1: The paraphilic sought help from a therapist to address their condition.
meanings.sent2: The community was unaware of the presence of a paraphilic among them.
meanings.sent3: The paraphilic at the party stood out due to their unique behavior.
meanings.sent4: She was intrigued by the mysterious nature of the paraphilic in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The police were called to investigate the actions of the suspected paraphilic.
